message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $20,000.
I appreciate your time and effort, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for it. Can we meet in the middle?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but $12,000 is too low for me.  How about we meet halfway between our offers at $16,000?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $16,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for the product. Can we discuss further?
